## What's this?

Experimental unsigned BW multiplier.
The core modification of this design is to both support signed, unsigned and 
mixed-sign multiplication.

## wtf 
Why doesn't this test pass?
A=
0100 1101 1111 1110 1100 1110 1011 0000
B=
1111 1111 0000 1011 1011 1001 0110 0011
1111 1111 1011 0101 1001 0011 1001 1111 0111 1110 0111 0111 0001 1110 0001 0000
1111 1111 1011 0101 1001 0011 1001 1111 0111 1110 0111 0111 0001 1110 0001 0000
1111 1111 1011 0101 1001 0011 1001 1111 0111 1110 0111 0111 0001 1110 0001 0000
